com.betleopard

Interface JSONSerializable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LongIndexed, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bet, Event, Horse, Race, User

    public interface JSONSerializable
extends java.io.Serializable, LongIndexed
    High-level interface to indicate that a domain type is serializable to JSON using Jackson. Also provides a default serialization method and some helpers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <E> E parse(java.lang.String parseText, java.util.function.Function<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?>,E> fn)
      Generic helper method that takes a string and a mapping function
      static java.time.LocalDateTime parseDateTime(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> dateBits)
      Static helper method that produces a LocalDateTime from a bag of date parts.
      default java.lang.String toJSONString()
      Produces a string containing a JSON representation of the object.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.betleopard.LongIndexed

        getID

    • Method Detail

      • toJSONString

        default java.lang.String toJSONString()
        Produces a string containing a JSON representation of the object. The default implementation just falls back to Jackson Java 8 serialization
        Returns:
        A String containing JSON

      • parse

        static <E> E parse(java.lang.String parseText,
                   java.util.function.Function<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?>,E> fn)
        Generic helper method that takes a string and a mapping function
        Type Parameters:
        E - The desired output type
        Parameters:
        parseText - The input data to be parsed
        fn - A Function object to take a string bag and produce an instance of E
        Returns:
        An instance of E

      • parseDateTime

        static java.time.LocalDateTime parseDateTime(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> dateBits)
        Static helper method that produces a LocalDateTime from a bag of date parts. Used for deserializing date fields.
        Parameters:
        dateBits - A bag of date parts
        Returns:
        A deserialized LocalDateTime object
